name: Tamil for Beginners ( Level 2 ) - Meenakshi Kalyanasundaram
description:
Learning Course Structure

Duration: 1 hour

5.00- தொடக்கம்
5.00-5.20
பகுதி-1- கற்றல் -கேட்டல் பகுதி
ஆத்திசூடி
கொன்றை வேந்தன்
திருக்குறள்
பழமொழி
அறிவோம் தமிழ்
5.20-5-40
பகுதி-2- எழுத்துப் பயிற்சி
எழுத்துக்கள் பயிற்சி (க-ன…..கௌ-னௌ)
சொற்கள் பயிற்சி
பாடங்கள் -காய்கறிகள் ,பழங்கள்,நாட்கள்,மாதங்கள்,குடும்பம்,திசைகள்,பூச்சிகள்..........
5.40-6.00
பகுதி-3-பல்சுவைப்பகுதி
பாடல்
கதை
விளையாட்டு
6.00-நிறைவு

About the trainer

Tamil language is one of the most ancient languages in the world. But learning with Iyal, Isai and Nadagam( is not the normal way children learn Tamil). Whereas, this learning session is focused clearly on activity-based language learning. Mrs. Meenakshi Kalyanasundaram is loved by children from all over the world for teaching Semmozhi in the most exciting way. 

Mrs. Meenakshi Kalyanasundaram is an Electrical and Electronics Engineer in Belgium. Her love for the Tamil language made her an active volunteer in Stockholm Tamil Sangam and Belgium Tamil Sangam. She has been teaching Tamil for the past 5 years now.

மொழியை இசையுடனும், நாடகத்துடனும் இணைத்துப் பார்க்கும் கண்ணோட்டம் பிற மொழிகளில் காணப்படாத சிறப்பு எனலாம். தமிழ் மொழி அறியாதவர்களுக்காக பிரத்யேகமாக இந்த Learning Session வடிவமைக்க பட்டிருக்கிறது. முத்தமிழை மையமாக கொண்டு அமைந்து இருப்பது இந்த Learning Sessionல்  சிறப்பு. 

Note: This session is for children who know the basic letters of Tamil Language. If you already do not know basic letters and words, kindly join the Tamil for Beginners - Level 1

*This course is free for members*

  • Age – 5+ yrs
  • The medium of Instruction – Tamil and English

  • Kindly bring a notepad and pen/pencil

name: The Becoming of India - Historical Storytelling by Kani Thiru
description:
Session 1: Muhammad bin Qasim – The first Arab invader’s attack on the Indian sub-continent is a very interesting and critical part of Indian History. 

Session 2: Gazhini and Ghori - Undoubtedly one of the greatest generals of  Islamic and Indian history. 

Session 3: Qutbuldin Aibak and iltutmish- After the assassination of Muhammad Ghori, Qutb-ud-din Aibak laid the foundation of the Slave Dynasty in Delhi. It is then followed by Iltutmish makes Indian history very interesting with lots of twists and turns.

Session 4: Balban and Qaiqabad-  The way Balban and Qaiqabad consolidated their kingdom is a quite interesting part of Indian History.

 

About the trainer

 

Kani Thiru is renowned for hosting a game show in Makkal TV called “Sol Vilayatu”. The game show made many people get in touch with many ancient Tamil words. Kani Thiru is loved by her audience for her proficiency in the Tamil language.

Kani Thiru believes, “We all have a fire burning in our heart for something. That is love for the Tamil language for me”. She loves reading historical novels and biographies. Her passion for the Tamil language is always expanding and she is always looking for opportunities to be explored. 

She is a stylist(Costume Designer for movies) for 10 years. She is a highly vibrant person and wants to share her knowledge with the learners here. “I believe that in every person and every situation there is something positive to look out for.”, she adds. Kani Thiru welcomes new ideas gracefully. She recognizes the importance of the collective contribution and arriving at a solution as a team. 

She shares her historical knowledge in her youTube channel. Various stories of men and women who are prominent in history are a part of her story series of “Oru oorula oru raja”.  This Story-telling session is mainly about many of the defining moments in Indian History. The backgrounds of the invasions and how India became Modern India that we are living in today. 

This is the most interesting storytelling session that you would have attended. This Learning Session is an absolute treasure for anyone who wants to know the Indian History in-depth and with the backgrounds and actual scenarios. She is highly admired by her followers/subscribers for her deep stories and treasure of knowledge that she has acquainted through years of learning and information gathering.

She is very passionate to share her knowledge with the younger generations. She proves that History classes need not be boring. She makes the session more impressive with her story sequences and the backstories that she has taken the effort to add. She is also very passionate to share the stories so that the younger generations keep in mind what they have learned. 

She makes sure that she takes you into an experience in that particular era. Are you ready to travel back in time? Are you the one who is yearning to listen to stories in Tamil that are soothing to your ears and enlightens your spirit? This is for you! Sign up and get anchored on our treasured history!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=spPVEvO-1A8

name: Banking Exams - English and Reasoning for Prelims and Mains  - Akanksha Chaturvedi, New Delhi
description:
Note from the Inspirer

  • The learner should come with an interest in clearing Banking exams
  • Allot different workbooks and notebooks for each subject
  • Read and practice topics that are given for practice

Learning Session Details

EXAM NAME- IBPS PO/ Clerk SBI PO/ Clerk RRB PO/ Clerk

Complete syllabus of English Language and Reasoning for both preliminary and mains

Do you know the changing patterns in Banking exams? She is very committed to sharing her knowledge to cultivate technical knowledge in the learners. Is it enough if we practice the problems and soak ourselves in the subjects? There is clearly a difference between just practicing and practicing with a certain technique. This can help you gain that extra edge over other competitors. 

Understanding the industry and patterns will help you a great deal to get your dream job and settle up quickly. Augment your understanding in line with the latest pattern in Banking exams. Akanksha wishes to build your fundamentals and basics to equip you to handle all kinds of questions with ease. She focuses on developing logical reasoning skills, thinking, and problem-solving abilities not just to solve problems in exams but also in life.

About the Inspirer

Akanksha is coaching the aspirants of Banking and SSC exams independently for 6 years. She has qualified multiple banking exams, therefore she gives perfect guidance for the learners. She holds an M.Tech in Computer Science. She has qualified SBI PO mains 2018, SBI PO 2020, RRB PO 2017, RRB PO 2018.

Akanksha is very fond of reading books. She also spends quality time in sharing her knowledge with the aspirants of Banking Exams. She also loves to make arts and crafts to use her time productively. She paints to wind and build her creativity.
short_description:
Learning Session Details (1-hour session)

  • Duration – 1 hour
  • Age – Above 21 years
  • Batch size – Up to 20 learners
  • The medium of Instruction – English, and Hindi
  • Key Learning – High-level problem-solving skills, Mock Test analysis for Prelims and Mains (Oliveboard and Practicemock), Exercise sheets to practice, Time management in exams, Access to Telegram and Facebook groups to get mentorship and guidance from fellow aspirants

name: MS SQL - Subramanian
description:
Course details

Subramanian will be teaching

  • Introduction to SQL
  • SQL Operators
  • SQL –Join, Tables, Variables
  • Deep Drive into SQL Functions
  • Sub Queries
  • SQL Views, Functions, Stored Procedures
  • User-defined Functions

About the Inspirer

Subramanian is professionally an SAP BI developer. Having 5 years of Development Experience he has conducted many faculties training programs in various technologies such as MS SQL, SAP Business Objects, SAP Business Intelligence, SAP HANA, and SAP BO Data Services. He is been doing this training program at both the corporate and institution level for more than 4 years. Apart from educating his learners, he loves gaming. He is such an enthusiastic person who guides aspiring learners to become a successful SQL Developer.

Today, data has become the hottest topic in technology and a company's biggest asset is its data. All databases require the language SQL to store and retrieve data. Do you want to master this in-demand tech skill? Then this is the right platform to learn SQL from a well-experienced professional. Don’t miss this wonderful opportunity!

name: Learn French (Level A1) - Sharmila (Chennai)
description:
Things to Know

  • For basic level A1, students need not know or carry anything.

Course Details

Session 1:

  • Topic: Les salutations(The greetings)
  • Communicative objective : Saluer et se présenter.(Greet and introduce yourself)
  • Grammar/Vocabulary : Les formules de politesse.

Session 2 : 

  • Topic: Comptons ensemble(Let's count together)
  • Communicative objective : Êpeler les noms et compter.(spell the names and count)
  • Grammar/Vocabulary : L'alphabet, Les nombres de 1 à 20

Session 3:

  • Topic : Les copains(the friends)
  • Communicative objective : Présenter un objet/une personne(To introduce an object and a person)
  • Grammar/Vocabulary : Les verbe(être),les articles indéfinis,les pronoms sujets, le pluriel de noms

Session 4:

  • Topic: Devinez(Guess)
  • Communicative objective : Interroger sur les personnel/objets(ask about people/object)
  • Grammar/Vocabulary : Les professions,Les nombres cardinaux

Session 5:

  • Topic: Dans la classe(In the class)
  • Communicative objective: Décrire une personne(Describe a person)
  • Grammar/Vocabulary : Le verbe(avoir),les adjectifs

About the Inspirer

Sharmila is professionally a French language specialist who is working in Amazon Development Center. Previously she was a French facilitator in Gateway the complete school and in BVM international. Having a desire to learn her favorite foreign language, she learned French with a huge passion. Apart from exploring the French language, she loves to get artistic. She is such an energetic person who loves to share her knowledge with her peers. She provides appropriate guidance to attain competency in the French language as per their grade level. 

There is nothing more thrilling than being able to speak to the locals in their own language when you visit a foreign country. Well, now you can experience that amazing feeling too! Utilize this amazing opportunity of learning French from a well-experienced inspirer.

name: Learn the basics of SEO - Arun K
description:
About Arun K - Digital Marketer, Author and Trainer

Arun graduated from Government College of Technology, Coimbatore after which he completed his Masters in Business Management from Great Lakes Institute of Management in Chennai. He spent over a decade in the IT Services Companies in different marketing and business development roles. 

Arun has been in Digital Marketing for 6 years now. He is consulting for SMBs and helps them leverage their business on various fronts.

Learning session Details

Here are the topics that will be covered at a high-level

  1. Why do you need a SEO
  2. Types of SEO
  3. How does Search Engine Work?
  4. Strategy and methods to be followed
  5. How to optimise keywords
  6. Title Optimization
  7. Understand all the tools: Search Console, Keyword planner etc
  8. Guidelines

Join me for a two-hour workshop. I will enable you to understand SEO and believe me you will master it soon.

Bonus: Get to know about five free tools that can help you zoom your online marketing efforts.

name: Carnatic Vocal - Mathangie
description:
You will be learning:

  • July 7th - Sarali varisai (lesson 1) -1 to 4 and Note swaram -Shakti sahita (swaram)
  • July 14th -Sarali Varisai - 5 to 9 and Shakti sahita- sahityam
  • July 21st -Sarali varisai -10,11 and Note swaram -Varasiva baalam
  • July 28th -Sarali Varisai -12,13,14 and varasiva balam =sahityam

Kindly bring:

  1. Notebook
  2. Pen
  3. Music Text Book

About the trainer

Mathangie is a dentist by profession but is a passionate learner of Carnatic music for 10 years. She has been teaching Carnatic Vocal music for the past 3 years. She teaches children to sing perfect notes in Carnatic music and develop their confidence in singing. 

While children learn the Carnatic Vocal music they will be able to easily learn other musical instruments. Learning to sing to a particular note fine-tunes their listening skills to a great extent. Children seem to develop an interest towards living a life in harmony with the music. Learning to sing also develops the child’s memory and teaches the formation of different patterns.
short_description:
*This course is free for members*

Learning Session Details (1 Hour Session)

  • Duration – 1 hour
  • Age – 5 to 15 years of age
  • Batch size -15 Learners
  • The medium of Instruction – English and Tamil
  • Key Learning – Improve your vocal range and listening skills

attributes.name: Age
options: I confirm my age is below 15

meta_data.value: The basis of Carnatic music is the system of ragas and talas. sing perfect notes in music and develop your confidence in singing.

name: Arabic(reading,writing and speaking) - Mohammad Anas
description:
About the trainer

Mohammad Anas has been teaching many learners to read and write in Arabic language and to read Holy Quran. He has done his Masters of Arts in Modern Arabic. He is teaching enthusiastic and devout learners for the past 10 years. He also teaches English, Tamil and Urdu besides Arabic. He holds many degrees including MBA. His dedication to the Arabic language has made this session happen.

Do you want to learn Arabic in its beautiful form? Do you want to understand the Holy Quran without anyone to interpret it to you. This is an amazing opportunity where you can learn to experience the Holy Quran for yourself. It is an unmatched experience to understand the words in the Holy Quran by yourself. Learner Circle wants to create this absolutely exquisite learning session for all the aspired learners who are seeking for a Arabic Class!
short_description:
*This course is free for members*

Learning Session Details (1 Hour Session)

  • Duration – 1 hour
  • Age – 6 to 60 years
  • Batch size – 5 to 10 Learners
  • The medium of Instruction – English, Tamil and Urdu
  • Key Learning – The learner will be able to read, understand and write in Arabic.

name: Creating Animation using powerpoint - Kowsalya Devi
description:
About the trainer

Kowsalya Devi has been working as a teacher for the past 10 years. She teaches children how to use MS Office and other familiar tools to make simple animation and web designs. She loves surfing the internet and knowing the newest trends in softwares. You will be learning to create animation using MS Powerpoint and so on.

Did you know you can do an animation using Microsoft Powerpoint? We normally use MS Word as a simple word editor and MS Powerpoint just to create formal presentations. There are many things such as this that we do not fully use in the Microsoft Office. This Learning Session will enable you to completely understand the MS Office and use it to its fullest potential.  

  • Introduction to Powerpoint presentation
  • Creating basic presentation
  • Applying animation
  • Convert Powerpoint to Video file
short_description:
*This course is free for members*

Learning Session Details

  • Duration – 3 hour (1 hour Everyday)
  • Age – Below 13 years
  • Batch size – 10 to 15 Learners
  • The medium of Instruction – Tamil
  • Key Learning – Develop confidence to use computer and all softwares

name: Communication and soft skills - Susan Jacob, Chennai
description:
About the Trainer

Susan Jacob has been teaching English for 20 years now. She holds a Masters in English Literature and she is also certified by TEFL(Teaching English as a Foreign Language). She also holds diplomas and certificates. She is very passionate about travelling, music, reading and theater acts.

She is very interested in alleviating the skills of the learner in communication and using their vocabulary to build their communication skills. She is now a Corporate trainer who trains young people who are aspiring to showcase their talents in their workplace. She helps her learner break the barriers to communication and paves a path to showcase their innate skills and talents.
short_description:
Learning Session Details (1 Hour Session)

 

  • Duration – 1 hour
  • Age – Any Age
  • Batch size – 3 to 10 Learners
  • The medium of Instruction – English
  • Key Learning – Get better at communicating their ideas and thoughts clearly to showcase your talents and skills.

meta_data.value: Alleviate your communication skills and improve your ability to communicate with your team. Showcase your talent at workplace with enhanced soft skills
